marklogic.body:
Kenneth Suel that's hysterical. Mike Brown also resembles Mr Potato Head
As for the article, Spot-on JR. Bynum's a big douchebag and I've Always thought so, for as long as he's been in the league, regardless if he plays for the Flakers or not. He's also a very dirty player. In addition to Barrea he's also injured Gerald Wallace and Michael Beasley while they were up in the air.
I'm looking forward to his next knee-injury, hopefully this one ends his career.
